backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature-to-file mappings and metadata describing implemented frontend features and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component that renders the Slideshow inside a full-screen background container.
frontend/src/components/DrawNameCanvas.t: Freehand drawing canvas component with resize handling and clear functionality exposed via a ref.
frontend/src/components/Ending3DModelSli: Final slide UI combining a drawing canvas, text input, model resolution logic, and 3D model display with SFX support.
Placeholder file for the old heart-collector mini‑game; currently contains no code in this snapshot.
frontend/src/components/ModelViewer3D.ts: 3D model viewer using React Three Fiber with lighting, environment, orbit controls, and a suspense fallback.
frontend/src/components/MusicControls.ts: UI panel for toggling music and sound effects and adjusting volume using local audio settings.
frontend/src/components/ShayariSlide.tsx: Renders a shayari poem over a styled background image with animated text lines.
frontend/src/components/SlideIndicator.t: Renders slide progress dots and a numeric counter based on current and total slides.
frontend/src/components/Slideshow.tsx: Controls slide navigation, background selection, audio playback, and swipe handling for the slideshow.
frontend/src/components/TeddyGameSlide.t: Empty placeholder file for a future teddy game slide component.
frontend/src/data/shayari.ts: Exports an array of 4-line shayari poems for slideshow content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useFreehandCanvas.ts: Provides drawing logic for a freehand canvas, including stroke handling and clearing.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, persistence, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalAudioSettings: Manages music and SFX settings with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub hook returning an empty object because no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeNavigation.ts: Adds left/right swipe listeners to trigger navigation callbacks on a referenced element.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines a romantic-themed color palette and animations.
frontend/src/lib/modelCatalog.ts: Maps input names and aliases to local 3D model files and provides lookup helpers.
frontend/src/lib/randomNoRepeat.ts: Generates a function that returns random items without immediate repeats.
frontend/src/lib/sfxEngine.ts: Implements a lightweight Web Audio–based SFX engine providing navigation, tap, and completion sounds with lazy initialization.
frontend/src/lib/speak.ts: Provides text-to-speech utilities using the Web Speech API, including speaking with options and stopping speech.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requirements, architectural notes, and current implementation state for the romantic slideshow app.
